name: Cross of the Dutchman
blurb: A legend brought to life. Experience the life of Grutte Pier in his quest to free the lands of his people from the enemy oppressors.

rewards.reward: Every single dollar counts. We need just 50.000 of you to make this project happen. Thanks for your support!

You will be supporting our cause, and help us finish this awesome project. Your name will be added to the credits of the game and you are rewarded the Ambassador status on the Cross of the Dutchman community.
You will get the game! On the day of the release, we will send you a digital copy of Cross of the Dutchman (plus all of the above).

You will receive an additional digital copy of the game, to give away to a friend! You are also invited to the closed Beta, where you will be able to help us put the finishing touches to the game. Finally, you will receive a digital Art Book with all of the concepts, characters and \r\nenvironments from the game (plus all of the above).

You will receive the Cross of the Dutchman novel! A book written by Frisian author Ate Grypstra. The novel is the perfect addition to the game and is available in Frisian, English and Dutch (price includes shipping, plus all of the above).
You will receive a kickstarter exclusive Cross of the Dutchman t-shirt You will also receive a DRM-free digital copy of the soundtrack of the game (plus all of the above, all sizes available).

You will receive a one of a kind, hand drawn sketch of Grutte Pier, the hero in Cross of the Dutchman. The sketch is drawn by Triangle\u2019s Art Director, Pascal Brander. The Sketch is attached to a hard surface to ensure it reaches you in the best possible condition (plus all of the above).
You will receive a kickstarter exclusive poster designed by the Cross of the Dutchman team and printed on high quality paper (plus all of the above).
You are invited over to our headquarters in Leeuwarden to join us for a huge party at the official release of Cross of the Dutchman (plus all of the above).

The ultimate designer pledge! You are given the chance to design your very own unique quest in Cross of the Dutchman, using all tools available to the developers. You will host your own topic on the Ambassador boards where you will get feedback on your designs, dialogues and required strategies. At the time of the Beta, you will be able to tweak your quest to perfection. Finally, you and all contributors to your quest will be mentioned separately in the credits as designers.

You, yes you, will be featured directly in our game. A non-player character (NPC) will be modelled after you, and dialog is added making you part of the story in Cross of the Dutchman (plus all of the above).

As one of our elite supporters, you will receive a genuine handcrafted sword. This sword will be designed by the people of Triangle Studios and branded with the mark of Cross of the Dutchman, as well as your name or initials (plus all of the above).

Simply put, you are capable of funding this project single-handedly, and you care enough for Cross of the Dutchman to grant us the ability to continue working on this awesome project. We will invite you over to our office for a hug, a firm handshake and a meeting behind closed doors where we will discuss your exclusive promotion deal for Cross of the Dutchman.
